changeSet.author: author
changeSet.sql:
create table users ( id bigint generated by default as identity constraint users_pkey primary key, last_message_a varchar(255), user_name varchar(255), user_telegram_id bigint ); create table messages ( id bigint generated by default as identity constraint messages_pkey primary key, in_message varchar(255), out_message varchar(255), users_id bigint not null constraint fkk208s2vdr0teqfb319mbi8f2u references users );
create table daily_domains ( id bigint generated by default as identity constraint daily_domains_pkey primary key, block boolean not null, delete_date varchar(255), domainname varchar(255), hotness integer not null, judicial boolean not null, links integer not null, old integer not null, price integer not null, registrar varchar(255), rkn boolean not null, visitors integer not null, x_value integer not null, yandex_tic varchar(255) );
